Name: Animals Memory: Dinosaurs
About the game: Animals Memory: Dinosaurs is a card game with pictures of different dinosaurs that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards. This part of the game is aimed at fans of dinosaurs. game Features: - Different levels of difficulty. From simple to complex. - 52 cards with pictures of dinosaurs. - It develops memory and is suitable for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children, teenagers and adults. - 18 levels. Ranging from lightweight to large and complex levels.
